definition: bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about

sentences.english: No wonder people said this hotel was pushy and bullying. But, how was this possible?
sentences.chinese: 難怪人家說地宮酒店囂張跋扈，可是，怎麼可能呢？

sentences.english: It was Britain's presence in Egypt that led to the brotherhood's creation.
sentences.chinese: 正是西方國家在埃及的跋扈導致了兄弟會的成立。

sentences.english: People live this time, should live arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 人就活這一次，理應活的飛揚跋扈。

sentences.english: She said you were domineering and rude.
The nation was seething with discontent as the noblemen continued their arrogant ways.
sentences.chinese: 當貴族依舊驕橫跋扈時，這個國家充滿了不滿情緒。

sentences.english: He tried to domineer over everyone.
sentences.chinese: 他想對任何人都專橫跋扈。

sentences.english: Chiang's officers and soldiers in Fuhsun city were very arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 蔣軍官兵在撫順飛揚跋扈。

sentences.english: He walks with an imperious look.
sentences.chinese: 他走的時候臉上飛揚跋扈的樣子。

sentences.english: He's so arbitrary and tyrannical that no one wants to work for him.
sentences.chinese: 他那麼專橫跋扈，沒人願意爲他工作。

sentences.english: A proclivity for violence and authoritarianism.
sentences.chinese: 暴虐和專橫跋扈的癖性。

sentences.english: Mrs Jones, the supervisor, really queens it over the girls in the typing pool .
sentences.chinese: 主管鍾斯太太的確對打字室的姑娘們專橫跋扈。

sentences.english: Aspect in their own world, bossy.
sentences.chinese: 在自己的世界裏縱橫跋扈。

sentences.english: He is a domineering sort of fellow.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個飛揚跋扈的人。

sentences.english: Mick's always throwing his weight about and telling people what to do.
sentences.chinese: 米克老是飛揚跋扈地告訴人們幹什麼事情。

sentences.english: I feel Mollys domineer is easily misinterpreted by clients.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得莫麗的跋扈更容易被客戶所誤解。

sentences.english: Mrs Jones, the supervisor, really queens it over the girls in the typing pool.
sentences.chinese: 主管瓊斯太太的確對打字室的姑娘們專橫跋扈。

definition: bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
